articles.author: Kyle Bailey
articles.description: September 9, 2023 10:30 a.m. The Tyee Ridge Complex is 46 percent contained and listed at 7,847 acres as of Saturday morning. The Oregon Department of Forestry Incident Management Team 3 assumed command of the complex Friday evening. 1,455 people are assigned to the fires. articles.title: TYEE RIDGE COMPLEX 46 PERCENT CONTAINED

articles.description: September 9, 2023 10:00 a.m. On Saturday, Governor Tina Kotek ordered all flags at Oregon public institutions to be flown at half-staff until sunset Monday night in remembrance of the nearly 3,000 civilians and first responders that were killed in the 2001 terrorist attacks.
